result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn R. Hunter

records.addlTxt:
Case Called: 9:09 am
INCLUDES 22CF839, 22CF980, 22CF1221.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person:
Defendant appears in custody, in person, and with Atty Joseph Kaupie in person;
VRCW. 
PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 22CF839:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  Reading Waived. Parties are to proceed to Plea Hearing at this time.

PLEA HEARING IN ALL FILES:
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to:
22CF980:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.

22CF1221:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
22CF839:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
Defendant makes statements.

COURT ORDERS: 
22CF839:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, AODA and Follow up, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 0 Days Credit. 

Adjourned: 9:32 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 28, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.
